name: 2D Platformer RPG Game "Bandit" (TEST VERSION)
description:
Hi, I'm ScreW. I'm a 16-year-old student.I'm trying to make a game on my own.I have a request from you, please try my game and send me your suggestions and complaints.The foreign exchange rate in the country I live in is very bad, our economy is bad, so I can't buy assets, if you see hope in my game and project, I would be very happy if you donate.Thank you so much for reading :) 

This is my first game project. I don't know what I'm going to do.
